## Summit Venue

**Seminar Room S-037, MLB Building**

**MRC Unit The Gambia at LSHTM, Atlantic Boulevard, Fajara**

The summit will take place at the MRCG at the LSHTM unit in Fajara, hosted by the Epiverse-TRACE Team. Covering a surface of about 100 acre, the unit provides a modern and fully-equipped summit venue at the heart of Fajara, which is in a convenient location to its attractions, transport facilities, and accommodations catering to all tastes. Attendees will also enjoy its marvelous green scenery during the summit breaks.
